item.title: 039-20231206-DestroyedPhandalalin
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log I head over to the Lord’s Alliance. It looks hastily abandoned but there’s a note the Note says if there are any survivors to head to the safe location in the woods.

item.title: 024-20230329-SearchingForGoblins
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log Identified Loot Circulet if vines turn into a tree for 10 hr.

item.title: 007-20220718-Goblin_Bard_Rescue
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session [[DnD/Sessions_Ep01/006-20220713-phandalin]] We do some shopping in [[Phandalin]] where we make friends with the shopkeepers of the oddities store #spelunkin .

item.title: 006-20220713-phandalin
item.description: Session Summary We do some shopping in [[Phandalin]] where we make friends with the shopkeepers of the oddities store #spelunkin .

item.title: 005-20220706-Goblin_Cave_Fight
item.description: Summary We defeat [[Clarg]] and offer him a clean death for information. He says that the only name he will give us is [[Cragma]] which we don’t know if it’s a place or a person.

item.title: Phandalin
item.description: Meta Town where Gundrin was heading. Hasn’t been fortefied yet Outpost for the [[DnD/World/Groups/Lords_Alliance]] Map Taverns stone_hill name: #stone_hill location: 1 barkeep: Tomlin (female: human)
